Uses of Package
com.joliciel.talismane.machineLearning.features

  • Packages that use com.joliciel.talismane.machineLearning.features 
    Package Description
    com.joliciel.talismane
    Entry-point package for Talismane - for simple usage code samples, see the com.joliciel.talismane.examples package.
    com.joliciel.talismane.languageDetector
    A package for training a language detector, based on a set of corpora, one per language, with one sentence per line.
    com.joliciel.talismane.machineLearning
    Top-level package for machine-learning.
    com.joliciel.talismane.machineLearning.features
    Generic features for use with Talismane machine learning, enabling various logical, mathematical and string manipulation functions in these features.
    com.joliciel.talismane.parser
    Transition-based dependency parsing (Parser), evaluation (ParserEvaluator), and output artefacts (ParseConfiguration, DependencyNode).
    com.joliciel.talismane.parser.features
    Various features specific to the dependency parsing phase.
    com.joliciel.talismane.posTagger
    Package enabling the part-of-speech tagging of a TokenSequence.
    The central class is the (PosTagger).
    It tags based on a previously constructed classificaton model, converting the model's outcomes to PosTag using the currently set PosTagSet.
    The PosTagSet is set via TalismaneSession.setPosTagSet(PosTagSet).
    The pos-tagger prodces a PosTagSequence which is a list of PosTaggedToken.
    It can be evaluated via a PosTaggerEvaluator.
    com.joliciel.talismane.posTagger.features
    Various features specific to the pos-tagging phase.
    com.joliciel.talismane.sentenceDetector
    Training and evaluation for sentence detectors.
    com.joliciel.talismane.sentenceDetector.features
    Features specific to sentence detection.
    com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser
    Tokenisation package.
    com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser.features
    Features specific to the tokenisation phase.

    Class and Description
    FeatureServiceLocator 
  • Classes in com.joliciel.talismane.machineLearning.features used by com.joliciel.talismane.languageDetector 
    Class and Description
    AbstractFeature
    An Abstract base class for features, basically defining feature equality.
    Feature
    A single feature that checks a given object T (e.g.
    FeatureResult
    An outcome for a given feature.
    FeatureService 
    RuntimeEnvironment
    An environment giving a feature access to any variables that were set during top-level feature initialisation.
    StringCollectionFeature
    A feature that returns a collection of strings, each potentially with a weight.

    An outcome for a given feature.
  • Classes in com.joliciel.talismane.machineLearning.features used by com.joliciel.talismane.machineLearning.features 
    Class and Description
    AbstractCachableFeature
    In addition to AbstractFeature, allows us to cache the feature result in the context to avoid multiple checking, and logs performance.
    AbstractFeature
    An Abstract base class for features, basically defining feature equality.
    AbstractStringCollectionFeature 
    BooleanFeature
    A feature with a Boolean result.
    DoubleFeature 
    DynamicSourceCodeBuilder
    Builds "flattened" declarative source code for a given feature, and makes it possible to retrieve the declarative version.
    Dynamiser
    Manages the construction of dynamic classes which flatten out the feature structure into declarative code.
    Feature
    A single feature that checks a given object T (e.g.
    FeatureClassContainer
    An interface allowing a class to act as a container for name-to-featureClass maps.
    FeatureParser
    Parses a function descriptor into an actual feature.
    FeatureParserInternal 
    FeatureResult
    An outcome for a given feature.
    FeatureService 
    FeatureServiceLocator 
    FeatureSyntaxException
    Occurs when the feature descriptor syntax cannot be parsed.
    FunctionDescriptor
    A textual descriptor of a function, used for parsing a list of textual function descriptors.
    FunctionDescriptorParser
    A parser for textual function descriptors.
    If the descriptor contains a double-quote delimited string, this string can contain \" and \\, which will escape " and \.
    IntegerFeature 
    RuntimeEnvironment
    An environment giving a feature access to any variables that were set during top-level feature initialisation.
    StringCollectionFeature
    A feature that returns a collection of strings, each potentially with a weight.
    StringFeature 
  • Classes in com.joliciel.talismane.machineLearning.features used by com.joliciel.talismane.parser 
    Class and Description
    FeatureService 
    HasFeatureCache
    Any context implementing this interface has a feature cache in which to cache features.
